title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4228.4 - Jockey penalized for excess weight
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4228.4 - Jockey penalized for excess weight

State Regulations

If a horse carry more than two pounds over his proper or
declared weight, his jockey shall be punished unless the judges are satisfied
that such excess of weight has been caused by rain or mud. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4228.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
